org.jooby.assets

Class Nodejs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.assets.Nodejs

  • public class Nodejs
extends Object
    Helper class that allows you extract and unpack a nodejs library from classpath. It provides a nice and safe nodejs execution environment.
    Author:
    edgar

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors  
      Constructor and Description
      Nodejs()
      Creates a new Nodejs and use the java.io.tmpdir as base dir.
      Nodejs(File basedir)
      Creates a new Nodejs.
      Nodejs(File basedir, ClassLoader loader)
      Creates a new Nodejs.

      Unpack and execute a nodejs library.

    • Method Detail

      • overwrite

        public Nodejs overwrite(boolean overwrite)
        Force to unpack library files every exec(String) call. This is useful for development and testing. By default files are unpacked just once (overwrite = false).
        Parameters:
        overwrite - True, to force overwrite.
        Returns:

      • exec

        public void exec(String library)
          throws Throwable
        Unpack and execute a nodejs library. Once unpack this method will execute one of these scripts in the following order: 1) [library].js; 2) main.js; 3) index.js. The first file found will be executed.
        Parameters:
        library - Library to unpack and execute this library.
        Throws:
        Throwable - If something goes wrong.

      • exec

        public void exec(String library,
                 org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<com.eclipsesource.v8.V8> callback)
          throws Throwable
        Unpack and execute a nodejs library. Once unpack this method will execute one of these scripts in the following order: 1) [library].js; 2) main.js; 3) index.js. The first file found will be executed.
        Parameters:
        library - Library to unpack and execute this library.
        Throws:
        Throwable - If something goes wrong.

      • release

        public void release()
        Release nodejs and v8 resources.

      • deploy

        public Path deploy(String library)
            throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • run

        public static void run(org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<Nodejs> callback)
        Execute the given nodejs callback and automatically releaseNow v8 and nodejs resources.
        Parameters:
        callback - Nodejs callback.

      • run

        public static void run(File basedir,
                       org.jooby.funzy.Throwing.Consumer<Nodejs> callback)
        Execute the given nodejs callback and automatically releaseNow v8 and nodejs resources.
        Parameters:
        basedir - Base dir where to deploy a library.
        callback - Nodejs callback.
